definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: 452:b. [[יתֶ֫רֶת]]: GFM (Dec. 28, 1899, privately points out that fat parts are alw. disting. from this; cf. now on [[יתדת]] Id.:SACRIFICE EB 4206 and esp. Id.:Oriental. Stud. für Th. Nöldeke (1906), 761, where it is shewn to be the caudate lobe of the liver.
